snippet: A Facebook ad service has the potential to increase ad revenue, but there are pitfalls. Also, at least three minutes of "Men in Black 3" were censored for Chinese audiences.
abstract: A Facebook ad service has the potential to increase ad revenue, but there are pitfalls. Also, at least three minutes of "Men in Black 3" were censored for Chinese audiences.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Turning 'Likes' to Ads, and Trims to 'Men in Black 3' in China
